What is section navigation?

Section navigation is in page navigation that allows users to quickly jump between sections of content as the scroll the page. The sections navigation uses its relation to the other elements on the page to determine what to jump to and it also uses what is visible on the screen to set active state. This only works well for pages with a good amount of content.

Here is why our section navigation is pretty awesome.

  • It becomes fixed when you scroll past the navigation.
  • It automatically updates active state by what you are looking at.
  • It automatically handles what to navigate to based on the navigation items position in the list.
  • It supports different background colors for fixed and non-fixed states.
  • It supports icons and images!
